nodes.text: Hasty Exit was a short narrative written by Peter M. Schweighofer, and was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

To'iir and Liadden, a pair of smugglers, were guests of Rithgar, the master of the Kothlis shadowport. Rithgar introduces To'iir to Tru'eb Cholakk, and the two trade rumors and information about current events in the smuggler underworld using their lekku to communicate. As they neared the end of their conversation, a Super-class Star Destroyer appears nearby and the smugglers each leave in order to make a hasty exit.
